title: name change ip price
body: needs to be lowered, its too high for people who dont own all champs... pls make it liek 9000ip

replies.body:
I believe that it is made that way so that lots of people constantly changing names doesn't stress out and slow/crash the servers.
Also, if you are a lower level, still buying lots of champs, you only set your name not that long ago... Why is it necessary to change it this quickly?
If you pick a name, stick with it. If you want to change it, it's not just going to be handed to you. I especially know.
